risk.title: Risk Warning
risk.text: When collateralizing DOWS synthetic assets, a "debt" is generated. The "debt" is the amount of xUSD they initially minted. Next, the debt will fluctuate with the gains and losses of other synthetic asset holders. When the synthetic assets held by someone increase in value, that part of the proceeds will come from the debts of all DOWS holders in proportion. Each holder must pay their debts to unlock their collateralized DOWS.

mortgage.title: Staking Rewards
mortgage.text: Users who stake DOWS can obtain 3 kinds of rewards: 1. Exchange fee reward; 2. Staking reward; 3. Loan pool income

rate.title: Collateralization Ratio
rate.text: All synthetic assets are supported by the collateralized DOWS. The minimum collateralization ratio is 800%. If the collateralization ratio is lower than the requirement, you will not be able to get rewards and redeem DOWS. You can receive multiple rewards every week if the collateralization ratio is met.

welcome.title: Welcome
welcome.text: Shadows is a decentralized synthetic asset issuance protocol, trade protocol, and lending protocol built on Polkadot. The value of these synthetic assets is guaranteed by DOWS.

synthesis.title: Synthesis
synthesis.text: Synthetic assets meet our diverse needs. For users with hedging needs, compared with the U.S. dollar, they need stable coins (USDT, dUSD, xUSD, etc., belonging to synthetic assets) on the blockchain to facilitate the flow of funds

transaction.title: Transaction
transaction.text: Trade your synthetic assets and xUSD.

liquidity.title: Liquidity
liquidity.text: Liquidity measures how easy it is to convert assets into cash quickly and without loss. The easier the conversion, the better the liquidity of the asset.

destroy.title: Burn
destroy.text: Burn xUSD to unlock your collateralized DOWS. This will increase your collateralization ratio and reduce your debt, allowing you to transfer DOWS not in custody

reward.title: Reward
reward.text: Stake DOWS to cast synthetic assets, trade synthetic assets, and get rewards every week
